title: Input Files
content: Text Capture Input files can be created in File Manager or here. The input files should confirm to this format.

title: Create Input Files
content:
Select Create Input Files.
1. Select Create New Folder or Select an Existing Folder to choose a folder.
2. Click Create Files in New or Selected Folder, follow the instruction of file creation to create files.

title: Upload Input Files
content:
Select Upload Input Files.
1. Select Create New Folder or Select an Existing Folder. Choose a folder to enable Upload Files button
2. Click Upload files in Existing or New Folder, the files should confirm the format of Text Capture Input files.

title: Select an Existing Folder
content:
Select Existing Folder.
1. Click Select Folder to select an existing Text Capture input folder to run Text Capture.
